author: Joseph Zucker
title: Patriots' Bill Belichick Thanks 'Heroic' Medical Personnel in COVID-19 PSA Video
description: The  New England Patriots  shared a public service announcement from head coach  Bill Belichick  amid the COVID-19 pandemic:         "I want to reach out to you in these uncertain ...
content:
Adam Glanzman/Getty Images
The New England Patriots shared a public service announcement from head coach Bill Belichick amid the COVID-19 pandemic:
New England Patriots@PatriotsLets keep stringing good days together and we will get through this.
A message … [+1040 chars]
